revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The universal accountant and complete merchant : in two volumes / by William Gordon, of the Academy, Glasgow. 2v. (Edinburgh : Printed by A. Donaldson and J. Reid...."
revision.text: Possibly: The universal accountant and complete merchant : in two volumes / by William Gordon, of the Academy, Glasgow. 2v. (Edinburgh : Printed by A. Donaldson and J. Reid. For Alexander Donaldson; and sold as his shops in London and Edinburgh, MDCCLXV [1765]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1873302~S1
